timesheet.loadingTimesheetText: We are loading your timesheet. Please hold on for a few moments...
timesheet.goToCurrentWeek: Go to current week or month
timesheet.hoursNotMatchedText: **{{hours}}** unmatched this period. All events must be matched before you can confirm your timesheet.
timesheet.allHoursMatchedText: All hours matched! Are you ready to confirm the period?
timesheet.allHoursMatchedPeriodLockedText: All hours matched, but the period is locked and no changes can be made to it at this time.
timesheet.periodConfirmedText: **{{hours}}** confirmed this period. Click **Unconfirm hours** if you want to do some adjustments.
timesheet.periodLockedConfirmedText: **{{hours}}** confirmed this period. The period is locked and no changes can be made to it.
timesheet.unresolvedErrorText: You have {{count}} unresolved errors. You need to resolve them before confirming the hours
timesheet.splitWeekInfoText: Selected week spans two months. Navigate between the first and second period using the command bar above.
timesheet.projectInactiveError: Project is no longer active. Please resolve the event in Outlook.
timesheet.customerInactiveError: Customer is no longer active. Please resolve the event in Outlook.
timesheet.noProjectMatchFoundText: No match found for any project. Click to resolve manually.
timesheet.clearProjectMatchTooltipText: Clear manual match. Remember: It's always better to automatically tag your events in Outlook. You know how!
timesheet.matchOutlookInfoText: **Please note:** You should try your best to match the event in Outlook, but in some cases it might be neccessary to manually match.
timesheet.eventNotFullyMatchedText: Event not matched. We found a matching customer **{{name}}**, but not a project with the specified key. The project might be inactive.
timesheet.customerInactiveErrorText: The customer is no longer active. Edit the event in Outlook.
timesheet.projectInactiveErrorText: The project is no longer active. Edit the event in Outlook.
timesheet.errorMessageText: There was a problem fetching your timesheet. Please try again later...
timesheet.exchangeLicenseErrorMessageText: Could not load timesheet. It seems you don't have an active Exchange Online license. Please contact your administrator.
timesheet.forecastHoursSecondaryText: Create a forecast for the week

allocation.noDataText: No data to show for the selected period.
allocation.customerChartDescription: Shows allocation per customer for the period. See how your **{0}** hours are distributed among **{1}** customers.
allocation.projectChartDescription: Shows allocation per project for the period. See how your **{0}** hours are distributed across **{1}** projects
allocation.ignoredHoursDescription: Ignored hours (either manually or by the system). Make it easier for yoursel and use a **IGNORE** Outlook category, or put `[IGNORED]` in the subject or body of the event.
allocation.unconfirmedHoursDescription: Hours not allocated to a project. Make sure you tag your events in Outlook to save you the manual work of resolving these manually.
allocation.tooltipDetailsInfoText: There might be more information availale. Click to show full details.
allocation.projectChartLoadingText: Loading your project allocation for the period...
allocation.customerChartLoadingText: Loading your customer allocation for the period...
allocation.navigateToEntityInfoText: Click again to navigate to the entity.

timesheet.eventDurationModifiedMessage: The event's duration has been automatically changed from {{originalDuration}} to {{modifiedDuration}}. If you do not want this to happen in the future, the function can be turned off in the user settings.
timesheet.adjustedEventDurationsInfoText: Rounding to the nearest 30 min is switched on. In total, recorded hours have been adjusted by {{adjustedMinutes}} minutes.
timesheet.monthConfirmedText: A total of **{{hours}}** confirmed this month. You have confirmed {{confirmedPeriodsCount}} out of {{periodsCount}} periods. You need to be in the **Overview** view to do adjustments.
timesheet.eventNoTitleErrorText: Please enter a subject for this event. Events without a subject will not be included in the timesheet.
timesheet.manuallyResolveEventActionTooltip: Click to manually resolve the event {{title}}. Remember it's always best to keep your Outlook calendar up to date.

timebank.balance: You have {{balance}} hours in your time bank.
timebank.balanceAdjustmentHint: Select the number of hours you want to add to your time bank. It is not necessarily all the extra hours you have worked this week, as you may be taking some hours as overtime.
timebank.incrementTimebankText: Store {{balanceAdjustment}} hours in your time bank
timebank.decrementTimebankText: Subtract {{balanceAdjustment}} hours from your time bank
timebank.balanceAdjustedMessage: Your time bank has been updated. You now have {{balance}} hours remaining in the time bank.
timebank.balanceAdjustmentNotAvailable: You need to confirm your hours for the week before adjusting timebank balance. If the week is split, both periods needs to be confirmed.

timesheet.periodLockedText: The period is locked by an administrator, and no changes can be made to it until it is unlocked.

projects.inactiveText: This project has been marked as inactive.
projects.noTimeEntriesText: No time entries registered for the project.
projects.timeEntriesErrorText: An error occured loading time entries for the project.
projects.keyFieldDescription: A unique identifier for the project. Used together with the customer key to form the key used to tag events in Outlook. Keep it short, between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
projects.createSuccess: The project **{{name}}** was succesfully created. Use **{{projectId}}** to tag your events in Outlook. Click to go directly to the newly created project, or stay here and create another one.
projects.inactiveFieldDescription: Mark the project as inactive. Hours for the project can no longer be confirmed.
projects.idPreviewText: You tag your calendar entries in Outlook with **{{projectId}}**. You can automatically create a category in Outlook by checking **Automatically create category in Outlook**.
projects.createOutlookCategoryFieldDescription:
Create category {{id}} in Outlook. 
This makes it easier to associate your Outlook events with the right project and customer.
projects.nameFieldDescription: The name of the project. This will be visible in your Timesheet, and in the project overview. Minimum {{PROJECT_NAME_MIN_LENGTH}} characters.
projects.descriptionFieldDescription: Describe the project in more detail. [Markdown](https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/) is supported.
projects.idPreviewBlankText: You will use a combination of customer key and project key to tag your events in Outlook. You can automatically create a category in Outlook by checking **Automatically create category in Outlook**.
projects.noInformationAvailable: No information available about this project.
projects.iconFieldDescription: Use an icon to make the project more recognizable in the Timesheet and Project pages. A random icon will be selected if you dont' pick one yourself.
projects.createError: We can't create the project at the moment. Please try again later.
projects.timeEntriesLoadingDescription: Take a sip of coffee if you've been busy lately...
projects.noLabelsSelectedText: Add labels to the projects for categorization. For example internal projects or projects that requires submitting hours in a separate system.
projects.keyInvalid: The project key must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
projects.descriptionWarning: We recommend including a quick summary of the project. This will provide a concise overview and help others quickly grasp the project's essence.
projects.customerFieldDescription: Select the customer associated with this project from the dropdown list. If the customer is not in the list, you can create a new one - or maybe talk to an adult?
projects.customerRequired: Oops! Did you accidentally ghost a customer from the list? Time to pick a customer and make them feel appreciated in our project - they won't haunt you, we promise!
projects.updateError: We can't update the project **{{projectId}}** at the moment. Please try again later, or ask an adult for advice."
projects.keyNotUniqueError: The customer {{name}} already has a project with key {{key}}.
projects.budgetTrackingEnabledDescription: Enable budget tracking for this project.
projects.budgetHoursDescription: The budget for this project in amount of hours. We do not take into account different hourly rates at this time.
projects.budgetCriticalThresholdDescription: The percentage of the budget at which an error will be shown.
projects.budgetWarningThresholdDescription: The percentage of the budget at which a warning will be shown.

roleDefinitions.infoMessage: Establish role definitions for the project, including positions such as Project Manager, Developer, and Designer. Additionally, specify the hourly rates for each role.
roleDefinitions.rolePlaceholder: Enter the name of the role.
roleDefinitions.hourlyRatePlaceholder: Enter the hourly rate for the role.
roleDefinitions.defaultRoleDescription: This role will be assigned to all new project members by default if no other role is specified for them.
roleDefinitions.defaultRoleError: A default role already exists. Please remove the default role {{role}} before adding another.
roleDefinitions.hourlyRateInfo: Use the up and down arrow keys to adjust the hourly rate up and down by 10.

projects.parentProjectDescription: Select a parent project to which this project belongs. This is particularly useful for organizing projects hierarchically and maintaining connections between related projects.
projects.parentProjectDisabledText: You can only select a parent project under the same customer, and there's no customer selected, or no projects under the selected customer.
projects.deleteError: This project has {{count}} associated time entries. To proceed with deleting the project, please remove all related time entries first.
projects.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the project **{{name}}** for customer **{{customer}}**? Before proceeding, we will check if there are any time entries associated with this project. If time entries are found, the project cannot be deleted until they are removed.
projects.deleteCheckHint: We are checking whether this project has any associated time entries. This process may take some time depending on the total number of entries...
projects.checkSuccess: No time entries found. The project can be safely deleted.
projects.deleteFailed: An unexpected error occurred while attempting to delete project **{{name}}**. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
projects.deleteSuccess: Deletion of project **{{name}}** completed successfully. The project is no longer available in the system. You will be redirected to the Project page in 5 seonds.
projects.projecNotReadyOrNotFound: The project is currently unavailable. If it was just created, please try again in a few moments. Otherwise, it may not exist.
projects.projecNotReadyOrNotFoundTitle: Project Not Found or Still Processing
projects.noAutomaticTimeEntriesText: Click **{{buttonText}}** to load the time entries for this project.

customers.inactiveText: This customer has been marked as inactive.
customers.keyFieldDescription: A unique identifier for the customer. Keep it short, between {{min}} and {{max}} characters and only capital letters.
customers.createSuccess: The customer **{{name}}** was succesfully created. Click to go directly to the newly created customer, or stay here and create another one.
customers.iconFieldDescription: Use an icon to make the customer more recognizable in the Timesheet and Customer pages. A random icon will be selected if you dont' pick one yourself.
customers.nameFieldDescription: The name of the customer. This will be visible in your timesheet and in the project overview. Minimum {{min}} characters.
customers.descriptionFieldDescription: A short description for the customer. [Markdown](https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/) is supported.
customers.createError: We can't create the customer at the moment. Please try again later.
customers.inactiveFieldDescription: Mark the customer as inactive. Hours for the customer can no longer be confirmed.
customers.iconEasterEgg: An Umbrella? Really? Right, you should be allowed since you are so good at doing your job.
customers.keyInvalid: The customer key must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
customers.descriptionWarning: We recommend including a quick summary of the customer. This will provide a concise overview and help others quickly grasp the customer's essence.
customers.keyNotUniqueError: The customer key {{key}} is already in use by the customer {{name}}.
customers.nameNotUniqueError: It appears that there is already a API-key with that name. Please come up with something else.
customers.noLabelsSelectedText: Add labels to the customer for categorization.
customers.updateError: We can't update the customer **{{name}}** at the moment. Please try again later, or ask an adult for advice.
customers.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the customer **{{name}}**? Before proceeding, we will check if there are any projects associated with this customer. If projects are found, the customer cannot be deleted until they are removed.
customers.deleteCheckHint: We are checking whether this customer has any associated projects. This process may take a moment...
customers.checkSuccess: No projects found. The customer can be safely deleted.
customers.deleteError: This customer has {{count}} associated projects. To proceed with deleting the customer, please remove all related projects first.
customers.deleteFailed: An unexpected error occurred while attempting to delete customer **{{name}}**. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
customers.deleteSuccess: Customer **{{name}}** has been successfully deleted. You will be redirected to the Customers page.

apiTokens.confirmDeleteSubText: Are you sure you want to delete the API-key "{{name}}"? It expires (or expired} {{expires}}.
apiTokens.editPermissionsDescription: Click to manage or customize permissions for this API token. Please note that permissions cannot be updated after creation.
apiTokens.apiKeyGenerated: Click the key to copy it to your clipboard.
apiTokens.apiKeyCopied: API key for **{{name}}** successfully copied to clipboard.
apiTokens.displaySecretKeyButtonTooltip: Click to reveal the secret for {{displayDuration}} seconds, then click the fields to copy it.
apiTokens.permissionsRequired: You need to provide at least one permission for the API-key. No point in having a role if you can't do anything with it? It's like having a job with no tasks.
apiTokens.tokenDescriptionDescription: Describe briefly (minimum {{minLength}} characters) how you intend to use the API-token, and explain briefly why you need the selected permissions.
apiTokens.warningTooManyPermissions: You've selected {{count}} permissions. We recommend not too be too greedy with permissions, but if you know what you're doing - sure.

labels.confirmDeleteSubText: Are you sure you want to delete the label "{{name}}"?
labels.nameDescription: Label name. No special characters. Just your everyday letters and spaces.
labels.createSuccess: Your new label **{{name}}** was succesfully created.
labels.createError: We can't create the label at the moment. Please try again later.
labels.deleteError: There was an issue deleting label **{{name}}**. Please try again, or ask an adult.
labels.updateError: We can't update the label at the moment. Please try again later.

subscriptionSettings.companyLogoDescription: Add the URL to your company logo. Either use a Base 64 image string, or upload an image from your computer. Recommended dimensions are 120 x 40 pixels. You can see the preview below.
subscriptionSettings.navBackgroundDescription: Custom background color for the navigation bar. If not specified, the default brand color will be used.
subscriptionSettings.projectKeyMaxLengthDescription: Maximum allowed characters for the project key.
subscriptionSettings.customerKeyMaxLengthDescription: Maximum allowed characters for the customer key.
subscriptionSettings.enableResourceManagementDescription: Enabling this setting allows for enhanced management of project resources. Once activated, administrators can access detailed metadata related to each project, such as "Project Leader" and "Project Members." This feature facilitates better oversight and coordination among team members, ensuring that roles and responsibilities are clearly defined and visible within the platform.
subscriptionSettings.showMyProjectsByDefaultDescription: Show "My Projects" as default on the Project page.
subscriptionSettings.enableProjectRolesDescription: Enable roles for projects. Set up a set of roles with time rates, and select one of the predefined roles when adding a new resource.
subscriptionSettings.enableSimpleHierachyDescription: Enable project hierarchy supporting setting parent project, displaying parent and child projects.
subscriptionSettings.autoLoadTimeEntriesDescription: When enabled, time entries will be loaded automatically without requiring manual action.

rolesPermissions.deleteSuccess: Role {{name}} was successfully deleted. It hasn't been assigned to anyone yet, so it's going just fine!

users.userFieldAdSync: The field is automatically synchronized from Entra ID when the user logs in, and can not be modified in did.
users.createSuccess: The user **{{displayName}}** has been successfully created and is now ready to begin submitting their timesheets. Feel free to get started right away!
users.updateError: An error occured when updating user **{{displayName}}*.
users.createError: An error occured when attempting to create user **{{displayName}}**.
users.addNewUserPanelDescription: Select a user from Entra ID, set a role, and any changed properties that are not automatically synchronized.
users.editUserPanelDescription: Change role or edit properties that are not automatically synced from Entra ID. You can also hide the user from overviews.
users.employmentEndDateDescription: The date the user's employment ends. If the user is no longer employed, set this date to the last day of employment.
users.employmentStartDateDescription: The date the user's employment starts. If the user is already employed, set this date to the first day of employment.
users.inviteExternalUserError: An error occurred while inviting the external user.
users.inviteExternalUserSuccess: User {{mail}} invited successfully. Ask the user to login to complete the registration.
users.noPendingInvitations: No pending external invitations at the moment.
users.cancelInvitationError: There was an error cancelling the invitation: {{error}}
users.invitationNamePlaceholder: Enter the name of the user you want to invite...
users.invitationNameDescription: The name of the user you want to invite â€” it's recommended to fill this out, but not required.
users.invitationEmailDescription: The e-mail of the user you want to invite. There might be limitations on supported domains.
users.invitationNameRecommended: It is recommended to provide a name for the individual you want to invite.
users.invitationRoleDescription: Please select a role for the invited user. Only roles that have been explicitly enabled for external users are available for selection in this list. If no roles are visible, it means no roles are currently enabled for external invitations.
users.removeExternalUserError: Please try again. If the problem continues, contact an administrator.
users.removeExternalUserSuccess: Their access to the system has been removed. If you ever need to invite them again, you can do it easily from the user management page.
users.removeExternalUserErrorTitle: Something went wrong while removing external user {{displayName}}.
users.removeExternalUserSuccessTitle: Success! External user {{displayName}} no longer has access.

weekStatus.teamsReminderMessageTemplate: You must confirm the following weeks in did: {{periods}}
weekStatus.teamsReminderMessageSinglePeriodTemplate: You must confirm week {{period}} in did.
weekStatus.teamsReminderButtonTooltiop: Send reminder in Teams to all users missing week {{name}}
weekStatus.weekLocked: Week {{period}} was successfully locked, and time entries can no longer be logged for this week.
weekStatus.confirmLockSubText: Are you sure you want to lock week {{period}}?
weekStatus.lockReasonPlaceholder: Optionally enter the reason for locking this week...

admin.teamsEnabledDescription: Enable Teams functionality like reminding users about missing submissions etc.
admin.noTimeEntriesText: There are no confirmed hours for the selected months/weeks in the selected year.
admin.tokenGeneratedText: The token was successfully generated. Make sure to copy your new personal access token.
admin.tokenErrorText: An error occurred generating your key. Please try again later.
admin.forecastNotificationsDescription: How many weeks ahead should users forecast.
admin.adUserSyncEnabledDescription: Automatically synchronize user properties from Entra ID when the user logs in.
admin.adUserSyncPropertiesDescription: Choose which properties that should be automatically synchronized from Entra ID.
admin.roleInUseMessage: This role is assigned to {{count}} user(s) and cannot be deleted.
admin.adUserSyncUserPhotoDescription: Synchronize user photo from Entra ID when the users logs in.
admin.vacationTotalDaysDescription: Total number of vacation days for each employee in the company.
admin.vacationEventCategoryDescription: Category to be used for tagging events in Outlook as vacation.

reportLinks.nameDescription: Enter a name for the report. This will be used to identify the report in the reports list.
reportLinks.descriptionDescription: Describe the report. Does it contain any specific functionality? Formatting?
reportLinks.externalUrlDescription: Enter a en external URL to the report. This could be a link to a Power BI report, a link to a PDF report, or a link to a report in another system.
reportLinks.publishedDescription: When the report is published, it will be available to all users on the Reports page.
reportLinks.createSuccess: Your new report link **{{name}}** was succesfully created.
reportLinks.updateSuccess: Your report link **{{name}}** was succesfully updated.
reportLinks.updateError: We can't update the report link at the moment. Please try again later.
reportLinks.createError: We can't create the report link at the moment. Please try again later.
reportLinks.confirmDeleteSubText: Are you sure you want to delete the report link {{name}}?
reportLinks.displayDescription: Where to dislay the report link to the users. On the frontpage or in one of the report tabs.
reportLinks.yearDescription: Choose the year for the report. If the report is for a specific month, choose the month below.
reportLinks.monthDescription: Choose the month for the report if applicable. If the report is for a whole year, leave this blank.
reportLinks.promotedDescription: When the report is promoted, it will be displayed on the Reports front page.
reportLinks.iconDescription: An icon to illustrate the report link.
reportLinks.iconColorDescription: An icon color makes the report link stand out more from the preset queries if the link should be promoted.

admin.editPermissionsDescription: Click to add or modify permissions for this role.
admin.userHiddenFromReportsDescription: This setting allows you to designate the user as "hidden" from your reports. When a user is marked as hidden, their activity and data will not be included in any generated reports or analytics. This feature is particularly useful for scenarios where you have administrative users or special accounts that should not impact your reporting metrics.

roles.confirmDeleteSubText: Are you sure you want to delete the role {{name}}?

admin.permissionsRequired: You need to provide at least one permission for the role. No point in having a role if you can't do anything with it? It's like having a job with no tasks.
admin.timesheetDayFormatDescription: Select the date format for the days in the timesheet. This is the format used in the grouping of hours in the timesheet. Example: dddd DD. See preview on the right.
admin.timesheetDayFormatLabel: Date format for days in the Timesheet
admin.timesheetTimeFormatDescription: Select format for time. Used in the Timesheet. Example: HH:mm. See preview on the right.
admin.teamsMissingSubmissionsEnabledLabel: Enable reminders for missing submissions in Teams
admin.teamsMissingSubmissionsEnabledDescriptio: Enable reminders about missing submissions in Teams.
admin.teamsMissingSubmissionsSinglePeriodText: Message template for single period reminder
admin.teamsMissingSubmissionsMultiplePeriodsTe: Message template for multiple periods reminder
Set the mesage template for a reminder for multiple periods. The token `{0}` will be replaces with the actual periods.
admin.teamsMissingSubmissionsSinglePeriodTextD: Set the mesage template for a reminder for a single period. The token `{0}` will be replaces with the actual period.
admin.budgetTrackingEnabledDescription: Enabling this setting will enable additional properties on the projects making it possible to visualize how many hours are registered for the project and how it's going. This feature will provide users with a simple overview of project progress
admin.securityGroupIdDescription: The ID of the Entra ID security group that should have access to the application. If the field is empty, users with access needs to be manually added to the application.
admin.securityGroupEnabledLabel: Enable Entra ID Security Group Access
admin.securityGroupEnabledDescription: Enable access to the application for users in the specified Entra ID security group.
admin.domainRestrictionEnabledDescription: In addition to the Entra ID security group, you can restrict access to the application to users in the specified domain.
admin.domainRestrictionLabel: Restrict access to users in the following domain
admin.domainRestrictionDescription: In addition to the Entra ID security group, you can restrict access to the application to users in the specified domain. If the field is empty, all users in the Entra ID security group will have access to the application.
admin.timesheetTimebankEnabledDescription: When the time bank is enabled, employees can accumulate overtime hours that can be used for time off at a later date. This provides flexibility and the opportunity for a better work-life balance.
admin.subscriptionSettingsUpdateError: An error occurred while updating the subscription settings.
admin.enabledForExternalUsersDescription: The role will be available for external users.
admin.domainRestrictionExternalEnabledLabel: Enable domain restriction for external users
admin.domainRestrictionExternalEnabledDescript: External sharing is limited to the following approved domains to ensure secure communication with trusted partners.
admin.domainRestrictionExternalLabel: Restrict access to external users in the following domains
admin.domainRestrictionExternalDescription: Specify which external domains your users are allowed to share with.
admin.domainRestrictionExternalPlaceholder: Enter a domain and press enter to add it...
admin.domainRestrictionAddMessage: Domain **{0}** successfully added to the allowlist.
admin.domainRestrictionRemoveMessage: Domain **{0}** successfully removed from the allowlist. Existing users will still have access and be able to log in.
admin.budgetTrackingEnableInvoiceEstimationDes: Enabling this setting will display estimated invoicing based on the hourly rates of the resources under each project.
admin.roleNotDeletable: This role cannot be deleted because it is essential or has protected status.

apollo.genericErrorName: An error occurred while generating the report
apollo.genericErrorMesssage: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
apollo.maximumCallStackSizeExceededName: An error occurred while generating the report
apollo.maximumCallStackSizeExceededMessage: An error occurred while processing your request. You might be requesting too much data at once. Please try again later, or do a more specific search.

reports.generatingReportProgressText: Please wait while we generate the report for you...
reports.generatingReportDescription: To give you the freshest results, we're generating a report from the latest data...
reports.noEntriesText: There's no time entries available for ``{{text}}``.
reports.selectReportText: Select a report below. Be aware that some reports can take several minutes to load. For some reports, there might be a pre-generated version available with formatting and layout already applied.
reports.availableReportLinks: There is reports available for this query. Use the buttons below to download the reports, and hover over the buttons to see more information about the report.
reports.fetchDataButton: Fetch fresh data from the server
reports.searchPlaceholder: Search in {{count}} time entries ({{hours}} hours) for {{preset}}..
reports.periodColumnDescription: Displays the period of the entry in week, month, and year format.
reports.filterCriteriasSubHeader: Specify filter criterias for the report to ensure accurate and relevant results. At least one filter criterion must be selected before generating the report.
reports.projectIdDescription: Enter the project ID consisting of a customer key and a project key (e.g., CAL AME).
reports.customQuerySuccessText: Your custom report is ready with {{count}} recorded time entries matching your filter criterias.
reports.customQueryDateRangeDisabled: You cannot use start date or end date while filtering by week, month, or year.
reports.customQueryYearDisabled: You cannot filter by year while filtering on start date or end date.
reports.customQueryDescription: Customize the report with your own filters, such as start date and end date, project, or employees.
reports.summaryDescription: Get a tabular overview of time entries per employee and period.
reports.customQueryWeekDisabled: You cannot filter by week while filtering on start date, end date or month.
reports.customQueryMonthDisabled: You cannot filter by month while filtering on start date, end date or week.

common.deviceViewNotSupported: This view is not available on your device.
common.stickyNavigationDescription: Makes the top navigation always visible even when you scroll down
common.userReportSummary: You have worked **{{hours}}** hours for **{{projects}}** projects _{{preset}}_. Click the button to the right to export your hours to Excel.
common.errorFallbackHeader: It looks like something went wrong
common.preferredLanguageDescription: did will display menus and buttons in this language.
common.signInDisabledText: Sign in is currently disabled. Please hold on.
common.vacationTotalDaysDescription: Total vacation days for the year. Includes transferred days from last year.
common.roundUpEventsDescription: Microsoft supports the ability to end meetings early or start late, typically by 5 or 10 minutes. This function allows us to round the duration of events to the nearest half hour. The setting won't take effect before next login.
common.roundUpEventsPostSaveMessage: Your change for "Round events to nearest 30 minutes" were saved successfully. The setting won't take effect before next login.
common.vacationCalculationTypePlannedDescriptio: Everything in your calendar categorized with IAM VAC.
common.vacationCalculationTypeConfirmedDescript: Vacation confirmed as part of your timesheet.
common.vacationSummaryTooltipConfirmed: The vacation calculation is for the whole year, and is based on {{usedHours}} hours of vacation confirmed as part of your timesheet (each vacation day is 8 hours).
common.adUserRequired: You must select an Active Directory user to add.
common.userSettingsSaved: Your settings have been saved successfully. If you have changed the language, you must reload the page for it to take effect.
common.outlookCategoryAdded: The project tag **{{tag}}** was added to Outlook as a category.
common.outlookCategoryRemove: [Go to Outlook]({{outlookCategoriesHref}}) to remove the category if you no longer need it.
common.outlookCategoryAdd: Click to add the project tag as a category in Outlook with color {{colorName}}.
common.projectTagCopiedToClipboard: The project tag **{{tag}}** was copied to the clipboard.
common.outlookCategoryError: There was an error creating the category in Outlook. If you just created it, it might take some moments before it shows up here.
common.signInDisabledMessage: Sign-in is temporarily unavailable. We're working to resolve the issue. Please check back soon!
common.workWeekHoursDescription: The number of hours in a work week. Typically 40 hours with a 5 day work week and 100% employment.
common.cancelButtonDisabledTooltip: Cancelling invitations is currently not supported.
common.noResults: No elements are available. This may be due to active filters or because there are no elements to display.
common.noResultsWithCriteria: No items match your search criteria **{{searchTerm}}**.
common.autoMatchScoreHint: You have auto-matched **{{autoMatch}}%** of the total entries, meaning that **{{manualMatch}}%** of the entries have been matched to a project manually in the application.
common.autoMatchWarning: The automatic matching score is below 85%. To improve accuracy, please ensure your Outlook calendar events are consistently categorized and consider adding the relevant project tag to the subject or body of your events.
common.autoMatchError: The automatic matching score is critically low (below 70%). To achieve better matching results, please categorize your Outlook events appropriately and include the correct project tag in the event subject or body.
common.autoMatchSuccess: The automatic matching score is very high (above 95%). Your Outlook events appear well-structured with correct categories and project tags. Keep this up to ensure accurate time tracking.
common.employeeWithRoleDescription: Displays the employee associated with the time entry, including details of the role they hold within the project during the recorded period.
common.invalidTimespanValidationMaxDays: It should be a maximum of {{days}} days between this date and {{name}}.
common.invalidTimespanValidationMinDays: It should be a minimum of {{days}} days between this date and {{name}}.

permissions.deleteProjectsDescription: Grants users the ability to permanently remove projects from the system.
permissions.accessTimesheetDescription: Access to Timesheet page for registering hours.
permissions.accessCustomersDescription: Acces to Customers page where you can search in active and inactive customers.
permissions.accessProjectsDescription: Acces to Projects page where you can search in active and inactive projects.
permissions.accessAdminDescription: Acces to Projects page where you can search in active and inactive projects.
permissions.manageProjectsDescription: Create new and edit existing projects.
permissions.accessReportsDescription: Access to all Reports. Last year, this year, this month, last month and forecast. Also supports calls with API key.
permissions.manageCustomersDescription: Create new and edit existing customers.
permissions.deleteCustomersDescription: Grants users the ability to permanently remove customers from the system.
permissions.manageUsersDescription: Manage users on the admin page. Add new users, one by one or in bulk, and change role of existing users.
permissions.manageRolesPermissionsDescription: Manage roles and permissions on the admin page. Create new roles and edit exisiting.
permissions.manageSubscriptionDescription: Manage subscription settings and billing information.
permissions.listUsersDescription: Retrieve the list of all users in the subscription.
permissions.manageReportLinksDescription: Manage report links. Add, edit and delete report links.
permissions.importUsersDescription: Retrieve users from Entra ID and register them in the system. This is not something that everyone should have access to.
permissions.manageApiTokensDescription: Manage (create new, delete existing, and view existing keys) API keys. It is good to be careful about who gets this access, as there is quite a lot that can be done with this much power.
permissions.listApiTokensDescription: List existing API tokens. You only have access to basic information about the keys. Name, description, created date and when they expire. You do not have the option of extracting the actual key needed to run the query from third-party systems.
permissions.inviteExternalUsersDescription: Allows inviting users outside of the organization to collaborate and access resources.

notifications.emptyText: You have no active notifications at this time. You have dismissed {{dismissedCount}} active notifications.

feedback.descriptionFieldDesc: To protect your privacy, please do not include personal or sensitive information.
feedback.ratingFieldLabel: How would you rate your experience using did?
feedback.typeFieldLabel: What feedback would you like to give?
feedback.submitSuccessMessageText: Your feedback was registered with reference **#{{ref}}**. Thank you for taking your time!
feedback.submitErrorMessageText: Sorry! We couldn't register your feedback. Something weird happend in our backend.
feedback.hasGitHubUserFieldDescription: If you have a GitHub user we can keep ypu posted about the progress on your feedback - if it involves any work for us.

formControl.minLengthMessage: The {{label}} field must contain at least {{options.validator.minLength}} characters.
formControl.regexMessage: The field {{label}} does not match the required pattern.

autocomplete.noResultsMessage: No results found. Enter at least {{minCharacters}} characters to search.

listControl.editingInfo: You are currently editing an item. Click **Enter** to save or click outside the input field to abort.

viewColumnsPanel.title: Edit view columns
viewColumnsPanel.description: Select the columns to display in the list view. To change the order, you can drag and drop or use the up and down arrows next to each column. Changes here does not affect the export to Excel.
